reviews.text:
I had an amazing experience at Springcourt! The atmosphere was warm and inviting, making it the perfect spot for relaxation. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring that every need was met.

The menu offered a delightful variety of options, with fresh ingredients and vibrant flavors. Each dish was beautifully presented and tasted even better than it looked. I particularly loved their signature dishes, which showcased their culinary creativity.

The ambiance was enhanced by tasteful decor and soothing music, creating a perfect backdrop for a memorable meal. I can't wait to return and try more of their offerings. Highly recommend Springcourt for anyone looking for a fantastic dining experience!

A really nice place for a Mother’s Day treat! Great service and ambience. The food is definitely different and of great quality. Paired with the friendly and attentive servers, this place checks all the boxes to make it a great restaurant!

Had lunch with my family at Spring Court, a Chinese restaurant. The interior was very, very nice and made the place feel cozy and welcoming. The food was also good, with nice flavors and good portions. Staff were friendly and helpful, which made the experience even better. A great place to enjoy a meal with loved ones.

April 2025

Came here for a large business party. Well prepared Dim Sum and Chinese cuisine! The shrimp dumplings and sweet and sour pork are delicious. I was impressed by the popiah roll. Truly an enjoyable treat to visit this place.

My rating as 5 is very satisfied.

Taste 5/5
Temperature 5/5
Speed of service 5/5
Cleanliness 5/5
Attentiveness and courteous 5/5

Highly recommended and definitely will return.

Came here for dim sum and it didn’t disappoint. Piping hot dim sum were served in minutes upon ordering, tasty with fresh ingredients, great flavours. Absolutely love the young coconut almond dessert, but the Peking Duck did not impress.

The service staff were friendly and attentive, refilling our tea regularly.

Overall it’s a good restaurant worth checking out and we will return to try their top 10 dishes menu with friends.
